content: Espressif's Wi-Fi + Bluetooth SoC family targeting IoT. Integrates dual-core CPU (Xtensa or RISC-V), RAM, flash, radio, and peripheral blocks (ADC, SPI, I2C, PWM). Programmed via ESP-IDF (FreeRTOS-based) or Arduino. Popular for smart sensor gateways, home automation, and TinyML edge devices.
